node.statement: Contradiction: Both p and q are even, meaning 2 divides both p and q. Therefore 2 divides gcd(p, q), which means gcd(p, q) ≥ 2. But we established in node 1.1.1 that gcd(p, q) = 1. Since 2 ≥ 2 and gcd(p, q) = 1 cannot both hold, we have derived a contradiction from our assumption that √2 is rational.
